attributes.action: Try to help stop live animal skinning in China
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
2,000,000 Defenceless Cats and Dogs are 
Skinned Alive Every Year in China
That's 5,479 Every Day, 228 Every Hour or Nearly 4 Every Minute 
All Dying in Excruciating Agony, please can you do all that you can to persuade the Chinese Ambassador to stop this barbaric cruelty.
